lead_paragraph: West Ham United's hopes of playing Champions League football next season were all but extinguished with a surprise home defeat to mid-table Swansea City on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Swansea Hammer West Ham in Penultimate Game at Upton Park
headline.main: Swansea Hammer West Ham in Penultimate Game at Upton Park

snippet: West Ham United's hopes of playing Champions League football next season were all but extinguished with a surprise home defeat to mid-table Swansea City on Saturday....
